channel.title: Lol help needed
channel.description: I need help on a few things. 1. How do i change the amount of exp the "Door" the "dummies" and stuff give... cuz ppl are lvlin like way too fast.. 2. how do i change the amount of damage ppl hit for the lvl of their strength. cuz it seems like most ppl are like killing things 1 hit.. 3. how do i change the bonuses of weapons and armour... Eg: slash gives 240 def and smash gives 350 def...u know and finally... how do you add new shops... :confused:

item.title: Lol help needed
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“sk8erman2006, post:1, topic:92494”]3. how do i change the bonuses of weapons and armour…
Eg: slash gives 240 def and smash gives 350 def[/quote]Open your item.cfg and look for the item you want. The last 12 numbers of that are the bonuses, the first six being the attack bonuses and the last 6 being the defence ones.

item.title: Lol help needed
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

[quote=“sk8erman2006, post:1, topic:92494”]2. how do i change the amount of damage ppl hit for the lvl of their strength.
cuz it seems like most ppl are like killing things 1 hit…[/quote]

This is what you do, open client.java and search

public void CalculateMaxHit()

Then, under that should be something like this

public void CalculateMaxHit() { if (playerRights >= 2) { playerMaxHit = 255; return; } if (playerRights >= 3) { playerMaxHit = 999; return; } double MaxHit = 0; int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; //Strength Bonus int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; //Strength if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); } else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive MaxHit += (double)(1.35 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00525)); } else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled MaxHit += (double)(1.15 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00175)); } MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.1); if (StrPotion == 1) { //Strength Potion MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0014); } else if (StrPotion == 2) { //Super Strength Potion MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); } if (Str1) { //Burst Of Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.005); } else if (Str2) { //Super Human Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.01); } else if (Str3) { //Ultimate Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.015); } if(FullDharokEquipped()) { MaxHit += (getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]) - playerLevel[playerHitpoints])/2; } if (chargeOn == true) { MaxHit += 70; } playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit); }
Now all you need to do is edit those calculations to your liking, and there you go! You changed their max hit.
As always, Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Lol help needed
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

[quote=“sk8erman2006, post:1, topic:92494”]I need help on a few things.

  1. How do i change the amount of exp the “Door” the “dummies” and stuff
    give… cuz ppl are lvlin like way too fast…[/quote]

Find the object ID of the doors and dummies, then search your code for

case OBJECTID:

and under that theres something like

 addskillxp(700*playerlevel[lvl], [lvl])

and just make that number less, or you can add a timer in there.

if (actiontimer == 0) { CODE INSIDE CASE; actiontimer = 20; } break

  1. how do i change the amount of damage ppl hit for the lvl of their strength.
    cuz it seems like most ppl are like killing things 1 hit…
    [/quote]

I’m not completely sure on this one, but if I were you you should search for

maxhit or calculatemaxhit

and keep searching until you find where is actually calculates it and it will have an equasion and just edit that.

Read full topic
